aboutus.desc: This is a short description about my self and my work.
aboutus.question: Who We Are?
aboutus.name: Vivamus Vestibulum
aboutus.overview: Senior Consultant in Obstetrics, Gynecology, IVF, and Endoscopy - PhD in Obstetrics and Gynecology - Fellow of the Fetal Medicine Unit - Kasr Al-Ainy - Consultant in Painless Natural Delivery, Painless C-Section, and 4D Fetal Ultrasound - Specialist in the treatment of vaginal bleeding, urinary incontinence, gynecological infections, and post-menopause follow-up - Pre-marital consultations - Vaginal and uterine prolapse repair - Hysterectomy and fibroid removal - Ovarian cyst removal - In vitro fertilization (IVF), intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI), and infertility treatment.
